response_parsed.summary: This explainer demonstrates how to effectively integrate the tkinter GUI library with the type hinting features introduced in Python 3.12 to enhance code readability, maintainability, and type safety for production environments.

Python 3.12 introduces new features that allow for more accurate and expressive type hinting
Combining tkinter with typing ensures consistency throughout the application
Using type hints in GUI applications can help reduce complexity and improve maintainability
